CreateSession.document: 锁定实例后，创建会话，以连接实例
CreateSession.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: gs.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateSession
<公共请求参数>

{
    "GameRegion": "字符串型",
    "GameId": "字符串型",
    "UserId": "字符串型",
    "ClientSession": "字符串型"
}
CreateSession.title: CreateSession示例
